name: Robot Hunter
description:
You have discovered a mine but unfortunately it is invaded by alien robots. If you want to collect gold from the mine, first you must shoot all the robots. Robots are numerous and will try to attack you from different sides. Be vigilant and try to aim accurately, without failures. In the break between levels, you can use your gold to visit the armory buy new and more sophisticated weapons.

Robot Hunter is an amazing action game in cyberpunk style with exciting atmosphere and characters. Find and destroy mechanized invaders that have taken over a gold mine.

Use your armory of weapons to defeat a well-defended army of robots capable of attacking from the ground and air.

Keep the gold mine operating and you'll be able to upgrade to better weapons.

Receive medals for destroying the bots, advance deeper into the mine and defeat your enemy in a final climactic battle.
